name: Try Again
summary: Try Again is a fast-paced, meta, 2.5d platformer about a video game test character named, Benny. Benny has hopes of moving on from being temp and becoming the main character. Benny has long been trapped in this unfinished game by The Designer, but an updated build is due tomorrow, which means it is Benny’s last day. Get Benny out of the grey box facility once and for all.
